install docker machine major version via brew install docker-machine

docker-machine upgrade

docker-machine create –driver openstack –openstack-ssh-user ubuntu –openstack-image-id 058ddc43-b871-4ac2-a067-d62194b35174 –openstack-flavor-name m1.small –openstack-floatingip-pool net04_ext –openstack-sec-groups default test

eval “$(docker-machine env test2)”

Spencers-MBP:apache spencer$ cat Dockerfile # This is a comment FROM ubuntu:14.04 MAINTAINER Spencer Smith robertspencersmith@gmail.com RUN apt-get update RUN apt-get install -y apache2

docker build -t rsmitty/apache .

docker push rsmitty/apache

docker run -d -p 80:80 rsmitty/apache /usr/sbin/apache2ctl -D FOREGROUND
